Player History
Earned first career win on 4/3/1985...
6/9/1985: Signed a contract extension with New York (Y), $4,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/16/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1990, off Orel Hershiser (LAD)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/3/1991 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/23/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $1,111,111 per year...
